E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/26/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Roy Howell



Date: Thursday, 5/29/1988
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Steve Fireovid



Date: Friday, 5/30/1988
Subject: Progress of Robb Nen
Dear Sir,
Robb Nen is doing pretty good at A Augusta Pirates!
He has an ERA of 1.27, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/31/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Dennis Martinez



Date: Friday, 6/6/1988
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Cal Ripken Jr.

Team Doctor
